summary: Paul McCartney, an English musician, has had several significant relationships. He was engaged to Dot Rhone and dated Jane Asher for five years, inspiring songs like "Yesterday" and "And I Love Her." McCartney married Linda Eastman in 1969, and they had three children until her death in 1998. He then married Heather Mills in 2002, but they divorced in 2008. Since 2011, McCartney has been married to Nancy Shevell.
title: Personal relationships of Paul McCartney
